Commands.Doublehand: Melee BRV attack  Mastery with 3 uses  Mastery: Moderate damage boost; 5 turns MAX BRV Up II
Commands.Doublehand+: Powerful melee BRV attack  Self: 5 turns MAX BRV Up II
Commands.Missile: Melee BRV attack after reducing target's BRV to 3/4  Mastery with 2 uses  Mastery: Melee BRV attack after reducing target's BRV to 1/2; Party: Grants BRV based on own MAX BRV; Self: 5 turns SPD Up I
Commands.Missile+: Melee BRV attack after reducing target's BRV to 1/2  Party: Grants BRV based on own MAX BRV  Target: 3 turns DEF Down I  Self: 5 turns SPD Up I
Commands.Iainuki: Melee BRV attack + HP attack  Slightly increases MAX BRV, ATK, SPD for 5 turns

Artifacts.BRV Guard Up: Raises Defense Power by 10% when BRV is over 50% Max BRV
Artifacts.Freelancer Master Boost: Increases the effects of Freelancer Master by 5%
Artifacts.Mighty Doublehand: Raises BRV Damage dealt by Doublehand by 10%
Artifacts.Mighty Missile: Raises BRV Damage dealt by Missile by 10%

Passives.Bonus Up All: Slightly raises Break Bonus gained by the party after breaking an enemy.
Passives.Doublehand Power: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with Doublehand.
Passives.Master Boost: Slightly raises Max BRV after mastering an ability.
Passives.Critical BRV Gain: Grants a small amount of BRV after dealing a critical hit.
Passives.Missile Light: Slightly reduces Action Delay after using Missile.
Passives.Doublehand Charge: Increases the max uses of Doublehand by 1.
Passives.Spirit of Competition: Grants 100% critical hit rate when BRV equals or exceeds Initial BRV and target's BRV is over twice of that BRV.
Passives.Missile Charge: Increases the max uses of Missile by 1.
Passives.Freelancer Master: Slightly raises Initial BRV, Max BRV, Attack and Defense of all party members after mastering two abilities.
Passives.Master's Initiative: Slightly raises SPD with ability mastery
Passives.Doublehand Extension: Mastery requirement for Doublehand to become Doublehand+ reduced by 1When using Doublehand, Doublehand+:  Slight BRV damage boost
Passives.Last Boost: Slightly raises MAX BRV if HP is MAX at start of last wave
Passives.Missile Extension: Missile use +1When using Missile, Missile+:   Slight damage boost

Weapons.Great Sword CP: 70: May equip the EX Ability Iainuki.
Weapons.Chocoblade CP: 15: Increases Doublehand's potency and further increases it when it's mastered.
Weapons.Mythril Sword CP: 35: Inflicts Small Defense Down for 2 turns after using Missile.When mastered, increases the potency of Missile's second hit and extends the duration of the Defense Down to 3 turns.
Weapons.Noir Calibur CP: 15: Slightly raises Attack and Speed of all allies after mastering an ability.
